mdRecord.dcterms:title: Glee Club
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt on photo: Recording session for album of University of Virginia songs. Sound recording equipment used for the recording of Songs of the University of Virginia, a three-record album to be released at the University by RCA-Victor early next month. Glee Club and band members spent fourteen hours recording the songs in Cabell Hall, under the leadership of Donald MacInnis, director of the band, and Stephen Tuttle, director of the Glee Club.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
